alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Harrison; Mills; Montgomery; Page; Pottawattamie; Shelby (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 18 at 5:30PM CST until January 18 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CST FOR WESTERN MONTGOMERY...MILLS...SOUTHWESTERN SHELBY...FREMONT... POTTAWATTAMIE...HARRISON...NORTHWESTERN PAGE...SOUTHERN LANCASTER... JOHNSON...NORTHWESTERN NEMAHA...JEFFERSON...EASTERN DOUGLAS... SOUTHEASTERN SALINE...SARPY...SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON...OTOE...GAGE AND CASS COUNTIES... At 527 PM CST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Persia to near Glenwood to near Eagle to extreme southwest Saline county, moving southeast at 40 mph. The back edge of the snow squall extended from near Blair to Elkhorn to Gretna to extreme southeast Lincoln, also moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions with near zero visibility associated with intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 1 and 82. Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 1 and 43. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 439 and 454. Locations impacted include... Omaha, Council Bluffs, Bellevue, Papillion, Beatrice, Nebraska City, Ralston, Fairbury, Tecumseh, Offutt AFB, La Vista, Plattsmouth, Glenwood, Carter Lake, Missouri Valley, Syracuse, Wilber, Hickman, Logan, and Springfield. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents. SNOW SQUALL...OBSERVED

area.areaDesc: Fremont; Harrison; Mills; Montgomery; Page; Pottawattamie; Shelby
